channel.title: My quick and easy answered question i believe, i'm just dumb. lol
channel.description: Hey guys i have a server, and a friend helped me on my last one, i finished the server, it's just when ever me or my friends go on, they cant walk well, it's very laggy and takes awhile to walk, im pretty sure it has something to do with me connecting through my ip then back to my router.. something about the "localhost" or the servers ip.. if you no what im failing on let me no, if you don't understand tell me what you dont get and i'll make it into better wording. lol thanks guys

item.title: My quick and easy answered question i believe, i'm just dumb. lol
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

You should connect threw localhost not your IP if you connect threw the IP it will most likely lagg. But just to clearfie all the other players should not be lagging if they are you either have a crapy computer or crapy internet

Read full topic
item.source: My quick and easy answered question i believe, i'm just dumb. lol
